paper_title.ja: 光触針式輪郭測定機の性能向上を目的としたスペックル誤差補正システム
paper_title.en: A Speckle Error Compensation System for Improving Measurement Performance of Optical Stylus Instrument

description.ja: It has been widely known that most optical stylus instruments composed of laser diode and objective lens are troubled with peak noise as well as unreasonable high frequency component in the measured data due to non-uniform speckle pattern in the reflected light. To overcome this problem, a novel speckle noise compensation system was developed and consequently less high frequency components could be obtained. In order to improve its measuring performance, we provided with an additinal compensation system in the orthogonal direction and designed the selection technique between the two alternatives. This advanced optical measurement system demonstrated that the peak noise and high frequency component in the finally measured data are significantly decreased. So this technique can contribute to develop a more reliable optical stylus instrument.
description.en: It has been widely known that most optical stylus instruments composed of laser diode and objective lens are troubled with peak noise as well as unreasonable high frequency component in the measured data due to non-uniform speckle pattern in the reflected light. To overcome this problem, a novel speckle noise compensation system was developed and consequently less high frequency components could be obtained. In order to improve its measuring performance, we provided with an additinal compensation system in the orthogonal direction and designed the selection technique between the two alternatives. This advanced optical measurement system demonstrated that the peak noise and high frequency component in the finally measured data are significantly decreased. So this technique can contribute to develop a more reliable optical stylus instrument.

paper_title.en: A study on profile method using optical stylus with speckle noise removal function

description.ja: Most optical styluses composed of laser diode and objective lens are troubled with signal noise when being traversed over machine tooled surfaces. The main cause of that signal noise can be attributed to laser speckle included in the reflected light from the object surface. It has been strongly required to decrease the influence of such speckle noise on the displacement signal of those optical styluses. In this study, a novel optical measurement system is proposed for a new optical stylus that has the speckle noise removal function. By using the newly developed optical stylus, surface profiles with less high frequency components were obtained for two kinds of machined surfaces with different surface textures. Applicability of the developed optical stylus to the profile measurement of engineering surfaces was experimentally verified.
description.en: Most optical styluses composed of laser diode and objective lens are troubled with signal noise when being traversed over machine tooled surfaces. The main cause of that signal noise can be attributed to laser speckle included in the reflected light from the object surface. It has been strongly required to decrease the influence of such speckle noise on the displacement signal of those optical styluses. In this study, a novel optical measurement system is proposed for a new optical stylus that has the speckle noise removal function. By using the newly developed optical stylus, surface profiles with less high frequency components were obtained for two kinds of machined surfaces with different surface textures. Applicability of the developed optical stylus to the profile measurement of engineering surfaces was experimentally verified.
